programmes.show_description: When a book editor helps a mystery writer add a romantic skew to his novel, their fictional love story falls of the pages and into the real world. (2022)
When charismatic salesman Mark's boss commissions shy artist Isla to make a sculpture, Isla's confidence blossoms and a romance unfolds. (2022)
Having given up on searching for the man of her dreams, Harriet is transported into the world of Pride and Prejudice to find one. No man can compare to Mr Darcy - can they? (2024)

Ex-dancer Luna pairs up with professional aerialist Bennet when he finds himself without a partner for the local arts festival. Soon, she faces the challenge of a lifetime. (2024)
Struggling to save her farm, a woman enters a floral design contest, where she develops a blossoming romance with a local pastor. (2023)
When Lolly's Aunt Gert gives her three magical lemon drops, she gets to experience what her life would have been like if she had lived her unfulfilled dreams. (2023)
Lawyers Mark and Dana are the perfect married couple... until they find themselves on opposite sides of a highly public divorce case involving a warring reality show couple. (2023)
When Lea is tasked with designing the cover of a new hit romance novel, she meets the author - the seemingly snobbish Michael. Can she learn not to judge a book by its cover? (2023)
A crime series actress returns to her home town where she encounters her first real case. Can her TV crime knowledge save the day? Mystery drama with Lyndie Greenwood. (2024)
Theme Park performer Lacey becomes friends with eight-year-old princess Rose and is swept up in the royal world of luxury and nobility. Nichole Sakura stars. (2025)
Surprises are in store for Ilana when she travels to Santorini with her Greek boyfriend Mike for a family wedding. (2023)
Georgie, a travel writer, travels to Melbourne, where she meets Zach, an ex-Australian footballer who agrees to be her tour guide and shows her that there's more to life than work. (2026)
When the older brother of the bride catches perpetual bridesmaid Cate's eye, she must choose between fanning old flames and lighting new ones. (2021)
When Naima meets Damian after her interest in an undiscovered music group brings her to Nashville, their shared love of music blossoms into something more. (2023)

An aspiring romance novelist wonders if she has been writing the wrong kinds of stories when she is shown the beauty of nature by a charming hotel owner on a retreat. (2022)
A single mother, surprised by her daughter's recent engagement, travels to the Gulf Shores where she unexpectedly finds love. (2023)
When charismatic salesman Mark's boss commissions shy artist Isla to make a sculpture, Isla's confidence blossoms and a romance unfolds. (2022)
